mn67:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava catumayam viharati amalakivane.
mn67:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena sariputtamoggallanappamukhani pancamattani bhikkhusatani catumam anuppattani honti bhagavantam dassanaya.
mn67:2.2: Te ca agantuka bhikkhu nevasikehi bhikkhuhi saddhim patisammodamana senasanani pannapayamana pattacivarani patisamayamana uccasadda mahasadda ahesum.
mn67:3.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
mn67:3.2: “ke panete, ananda, uccasadda mahasadda, kevatta manne macchavilope”ti?
mn67:3.3: “Etani, bhante, sariputtamoggallanappamukhani pancamattani bhikkhusatani catumam anuppattani bhagavantam dassanaya.
mn67:3.4: Te agantuka bhikkhu nevasikehi bhikkhuhi saddhim patisammodamana senasanani pannapayamana pattacivarani patisamayamana uccasadda mahasadda”ti.
mn67:4.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato patissutva yena te bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva te bhikkhu etadavoca:
mn67:4.5: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato anandassa patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinne kho te bhikkhu bhagava etadavoca:
mn67:4.6: “kim nu tumhe, bhikkhave, uccasadda mahasadda, kevatta manne macchavilope”ti?
mn67:4.7: “Imani, bhante, sariputtamoggallanappamukhani pancamattani bhikkhusatani catumam anuppattani bhagavantam dassanaya.
mn67:4.8: Teme agantuka bhikkhu nevasikehi bhikkhuhi saddhim patisammodamana senasanani pannapayamana pattacivarani patisamayamana uccasadda mahasadda”ti.
mn67:5.1: “Gacchatha, bhikkhave, panamemi vo, na vo mama santike vatthabban”ti.
mn67:5.2: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya pakkamimsu.
mn67:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena catumeyyaka sakya santhagare sannipatita honti kenacideva karaniyena.
mn67:6.2: Addasamsu kho catumeyyaka sakya te bhikkhu duratova agacchante;
mn67:6.3: disvana yena te bhikkhu tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva te bhikkhu etadavocum:
mn67:6.6: “Tenahayasmanto muhuttam nisidatha, appeva nama mayam sakkuneyyama bhagavantam pasadetun”ti.
mn67:6.7: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu catumeyyakanam sakyanam paccassosum.
mn67:7.1: Atha kho catumeyyaka sakya yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho catumeyyaka sakya bhagavantam etadavocum:
mn67:7.4: Seyyathapi, bhante, bhagavata pubbe bhikkhusangho anuggahito; evameva bhagava etarahi anugganhatu bhikkhusangham.
mn67:7.5: Santettha, bhante, bhikkhu nava acirapabbajita adhunagata imam dhammavinayam.
mn67:7.6: Tesam bhagavantam dassanaya alabhantanam siya annathattam, siya viparinamo.
mn67:7.7: Seyyathapi, bhante, bijanam tarunanam udakam alabhantanam siya annathattam siya viparinamo;
mn67:7.8: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhu nava acirapabbajita adhunagata imam dhammavinayam, tesam bhagavantam dassanaya alabhantanam siya annathattam, siya viparinamo.
mn67:7.9: Seyyathapi, bhante, vacchassa tarunassa mataram apassantassa siya annathattam, siya viparinamo;
mn67:7.10: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhu nava acirapabbajita adhunagata imam dhammavinayam, tesam bhagavantam apassantanam siya annathattam, siya viparinamo.
mn67:7.13: Seyyathapi, bhante, bhagavata pubbe bhikkhusangho anuggahito; evameva bhagava etarahi anugganhatu bhikkhusanghan”ti.
mn67:8.1: Atha kho brahma sahampati bhagavato cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva—brahmaloke antarahito bhagavato purato paturahosi.
mn67:8.2: Atha kho brahma sahampati ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn67:9.3: Seyyathapi, bhante, bhagavata pubbe bhikkhusangho anuggahito; evameva bhagava etarahi anugganhatu bhikkhusangham.
mn67:9.4: Santettha, bhante, bhikkhu nava acirapabbajita adhunagata imam dhammavinayam, tesam bhagavantam dassanaya alabhantanam siya annathattam, siya viparinamo.
mn67:9.5: Seyyathapi, bhante, bijanam tarunanam udakam alabhantanam siya annathattam, siya viparinamo;
mn67:9.6: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhu nava acirapabbajita adhunagata imam dhammavinayam, tesam bhagavantam dassanaya alabhantanam siya annathattam, siya viparinamo.
mn67:9.7: Seyyathapi, bhante, vacchassa tarunassa mataram apassantassa siya annathattam, siya viparinamo;
mn67:9.8: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhu nava acirapabbajita adhunagata imam dhammavinayam, tesam bhagavantam apassantanam siya annathattam, siya viparinamo.
mn67:9.11: Seyyathapi, bhante, bhagavata pubbe bhikkhusangho anuggahito; evameva bhagava etarahi anugganhatu bhikkhusanghan”ti.
mn67:10.1: Asakkhimsu kho catumeyyaka ca sakya brahma ca sahampati bhagavantam pasadetum bijupamena ca tarunupamena ca.
mn67:11.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano bhikkhu amantesi:
mn67:11.3: Pasadito bhagava catumeyyakehi ca sakyehi brahmuna ca sahampatina bijupamena ca tarunupamena ca”ti.
mn67:12.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahamoggallanassa patissutva utthayasana pattacivaramadaya yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam sariputtam bhagava etadavoca:
mn67:12.2: “kinti te, sariputta, ahosi maya bhikkhusanghe panamite”ti?
mn67:12.5: Appossukko dani bhagava ditthadhammasukhaviharam anuyutto viharissati, mayampi dani appossukka ditthadhammasukhaviharamanuyutta viharissama’”ti.
mn67:12.6: “Agamehi tvam, sariputta, agamehi tvam, sariputta, ditthadhammasukhaviharan”ti.
mn67:13.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam mahamoggallanam amantesi:
mn67:13.2: “kinti te, moggallana, ahosi maya bhikkhusanghe panamite”ti?
mn67:13.5: Appossukko dani bhagava ditthadhammasukhaviharam anuyutto viharissati, ahanca dani ayasma ca sariputto bhikkhusangham pariharissama’”ti.
mn67:13.7: Aham va hi, moggallana, bhikkhusangham parihareyyam sariputtamoggallana va”ti.
mn67:14.5: imani, bhikkhave, cattari bhayani udakorohante patikankhitabbani.
mn67:15.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cattarimani bhayani idhekacce puggale imasmim dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajite patikankhitabbani.
mn67:16.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajito hoti:
mn67:16.3: ‘otinnomhi jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi dukkhotinno dukkhapareto;
mn67:16.4: appeva nama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriya pannayetha’ti.
mn67:16.5: Tamenam tatha pabbajitam samanam sabrahmacari ovadanti, anusasanti:
mn67:16.6: ‘evam te abhikkamitabbam, evam te patikkamitabbam, evam te alokitabbam, evam te vilokitabbam, evam te saminjitabbam, evam te pasaritabbam, evam te sanghatipattacivaram dharetabban’ti.
mn67:16.8: ‘mayam kho pubbe agariyabhuta samana anne ovadama, anusasama.
mn67:16.9: Ime panamhakam puttamatta manne, nattamatta manne, amhe ovaditabbam anusasitabbam mannanti’ti.
mn67:16.11: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, umibhayassa bhito sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavatto.
mn67:17.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajito hoti:
mn67:17.3: ‘otinnomhi jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi dukkhotinno dukkhapareto;
mn67:17.4: appeva nama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriya pannayetha’ti.
mn67:17.5: Tamenam tatha pabbajitam samanam sabrahmacari ovadanti anusasanti:
mn67:17.6: ‘idam te khaditabbam, idam te na khaditabbam; idam te bhunjitabbam, idam te na bhunjitabbam; idam te sayitabbam, idam te na sayitabbam; idam te patabbam, idam te na patabbam; kappiyam te khaditabbam, akappiyam te na khaditabbam; kappiyam te bhunjitabbam, akappiyam te na bhunjitabbam; kappiyam te sayitabbam, akappiyam te na sayitabbam; kappiyam te patabbam, akappiyam te na patabbam; kale te khaditabbam, vikale te na khaditabbam; kale te bhunjitabbam, vikale te na bhunjitabbam; kale te sayitabbam, vikale te na sayitabbam; kale te patabbam, vikale te na patabban’ti.
mn67:17.7: Tassa evam hoti: ‘mayam kho pubbe agariyabhuta samana yam icchama tam khadama, yam na icchama na tam khadama; yam icchama tam bhunjama, yam na icchama na tam bhunjama; yam icchama tam sayama, yam na icchama na tam sayama; yam icchama tam pivama, yam na icchama na tam pivama;
mn67:17.8: kappiyampi khadama, akappiyampi khadama; kappiyampi bhunjama, akappiyampi bhunjama; kappiyampi sayama, akappiyampi sayama; kappiyampi pivama, akappiyampi pivama; kalepi khadama, vikalepi khadama; kalepi bhunjama vikalepi bhunjama; kalepi sayama, vikalepi sayama; kalepi pivama, vikalepi pivama.
mn67:17.9: Yampi no saddha gahapatika diva vikale panitam khadaniyam bhojaniyam denti tatthapime mukhavaranam manne karonti’ti.
mn67:17.11: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, kumbhilabhayassa bhito sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavatto.
mn67:18.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajito hoti:
mn67:18.3: ‘otinnomhi jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi dukkhotinno dukkhapareto;
mn67:18.4: appeva nama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriya pannayetha’ti.
mn67:18.5: So evam pabbajito samano pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisati.
mn67:18.6: Arakkhiteneva kayena arakkhitaya vacaya anupatthitaya satiya asamvutehi indriyehi so tattha passati gahapatim va gahapatiputtam va pancahi kamagunehi samappitam samangibhutam paricarayamanam.
mn67:18.8: ‘mayam kho pubbe agariyabhuta samana pancahi kamagunehi samappita samangibhuta paricarimha.
mn67:18.9: Samvijjanti kho pana me kule bhoga.
mn67:18.10: Sakka bhoge ca bhunjitum punnani ca katun’ti.
mn67:18.12: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, avattabhayassa bhito sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavatto.
mn67:19.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajito hoti:
mn67:19.3: ‘otinnomhi jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi dukkhotinno dukkhapareto;
mn67:19.4: appeva nama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriya pannayetha’ti.
mn67:19.5: So evam pabbajito samano pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisati.
mn67:19.6: Arakkhiteneva kayena arakkhitaya vacaya anupatthitaya satiya asamvutehi indriyehi so tattha passati matugamam dunnivattham va dupparutam va.
mn67:19.7: Tassa matugamam disva dunnivattham va dupparutam va rago cittam anuddhamseti.
mn67:19.8: So raganuddhamsena cittena sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattati.
mn67:19.9: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, susukabhayassa bhito sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavatto.
mn67:20.1: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari bhayani, idhekacce puggale imasmim dhammavinaye agarasma anagariyam pabbajite patikankhitabbani”ti.
mn67:20.3: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
